analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/45/0x54a90505845502afb04b4fc6791a4dd9798518fe.sol:
	Contract PakGoldCoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/45/0x54a90505845502afb04b4fc6791a4dd9798518fe.sol#374-376)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/45/0x54a90505845502afb04b4fc6791a4dd9798518fe.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/45/0x54a90505845502afb04b4fc6791a4dd9798518fe.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/45/0x54a90505845502afb04b4fc6791a4dd9798518fe.sol#164-166) is not in mixedCase
